Here is the quiz created by ****. Accept the challenge and answer questions to find out how well you really know your friend!

After answering all the questions you\'ll get a link to your friendship quiz. Share it with your friends on Whatsapp, Messenger or via email to check how well your friends really know you ğŸ˜‰! Who\'s ready to take up the challenge and who will get the highest score?

It\'s supposed to be fun ğŸ˜„! Don\'t take the results too seriously ğŸ˜µ! If your friends score a low number of points ğŸ’¯ it doesn\'t mean that your bond is weak ğŸ˜•. It might mean that your questions were really tricky or still there is a lot to find out about each other and strengthen your friendship!
